programme.desc: There's always something new to talk about over breakfast. Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim bring you the latest overnight developments and all the latest news you need, plus interviews, sport, finance and weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep250
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you the top stories of the morning and the latest news as it happens. We cross to ABC News reporters on the scene across Australia and around the globe plus media conferences and analysis from experts.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep250
programme.desc: Watch what happens as the day unfolds live. Lorna Dunkley brings you the top stories, breaking news, original reporting plus the latest details and special guests to keep you informed and up to date on the issues that matter.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep39
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Gardening Australia celebrates the holiday season as Costa Georgiadis visits Jimmy and Jane Barnes at home, Clarence Slockee transforms a boggy spot into a rain garden, and Jerry Coleby-Williams explores fragrant frangipani.

programme.title: Christmas Sounds Better This Year
programme.desc: Every Christmas the same old songs are played so we got some talented people to compose new ones. In this heart-warming musical adventure we celebrate the Australian Christmas spirit at its very best.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Dr Harry Cooper is Australia's original TV vet and one of our most trusted faces. He built a successful vet practice and then stumbled onto our screens where he's remained ever since. Anh captures his wisdom and passion.

programme.title: Back To Nature Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Hosts Aaron Pedersen and Holly Ringland visit South Australia's Mount Lofty Ranges, meet a senior Kaurna man, and hear about the creation giant Nganno. Near the coast they walk with artist and chef Poh.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep14
programme.desc: Kirsten Aiken brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep250
programme.desc: Kirsten Aiken brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep250
programme.desc: Meredith Sheehan presents a complete round-up of the day's top stories, the latest news and the issues that matter. ABC Evening News brings together the best reporting from across the nation and speaks with expert guests.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep250
programme.desc: Australians turn to ABC News when news breaks at home or abroad. Meredith Sheehan presents the day's top stories, latest news and information, exclusive investigations and reports from respected journalists across the nation.

programme.title: Farewell to Leigh Sales - A 7.30 Special
programme.desc: We look back over Leigh Sales' 12 years as host of 7.30 including her most memorable interviews with some of the world's most powerful and famous figures, plus never-before-seen footage from behind the scenes.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep255
programme.desc: Meredith Sheehan brings you a clearer picture of the day's top stories with local, national and global news reports. Australia's most trusted news source has the issues and events covered from all angles to keep you in touch.

programme.title: A Girl's Guide To Hunting, Fishing And Wild Cooking Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Analiese faces her biggest challenge yet, slaughtering the pigs she's reared for meat. Friends from the mainland, including Adam Liaw, Jo Barrett and Alanna Sapwell who reaffirm her commitment to her new life.

programme.title: Classic Choir: Oh Christmas Tree
programme.desc: The ABC Classic Choir sing a new arrangement of a Christmas favourite 'Oh Christmas Tree (Yerrbill with Clarence)' with new lyrics by Gardening Australia's Clarence Slockee and musical arrangement by Joseph Twist.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep255
programme.desc: Australia's most trusted source of independent news, ABC News connects Australians with the latest news, original reporting, reliable information and analysis to keep you informed and up-to-date. Presented by Matt Wordsworth.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Series Ep2
programme.desc: In this Summer Special of The Business, the team looks at the pandemic recovery, the industries that were most affected, and the crippling impact of soaring inflation and rising interest rates. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep255
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date with full coverage of today's top stories and the latest news. Matt Wordsworth brings you a complete snapshot of what's going on across the cities and suburbs, regions and rural Australia.

programme.title: The World In 2022 - Asia Pacific
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor looks back at the big stories that shaped our region in 2022. From the Hunga Tonga eruption, to the assassination of Shinzo Abe, and China's push for power in the Pacific - the region has changed forever.

programme.title: Fault Lines 2022
programme.desc: We thought we'd beaten COVID, until war and economic strife, protest and authoritarianism reminded us how rapidly things can change in a connected world. War, inflation and an unfolding climate crisis sets the scene for 2023.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep255
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date with the best coverage of today's top stories and the latest news. Tyne Logan brings you a complete snapshot of what's happening in the cities and suburbs, regions and rural Australia.

programme.title: Going Places With Ernie Dingo Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Ernie travels to Bathurst Island to meet a dedicated and passionate nun, a woman working with young families and two local artists who share their love for their Culture.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Rookie miners Justin Lang and Dan Becker tread a dangerous path deep underground, chasing a seam of opal in the supporting walls of the mine. The closer they get, the more danger they put themselves in.

programme.title: Core Kyoto
programme.desc: Today: Kyoto State Guest House, hospitality imbued with beauty and craftsmanship. The ancient capital, Kyoto, continues to be innovative after 1,200 years. We dive deep into its core.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Design Talks Plus
programme.desc: What is good design? And what is its power? From traditional to cutting edge, we explore Japanese designs that are literally shaping our lives.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: In a Japanophiles interview, US musician and researcher Colleen Schmuckal tells Peter Barakan about playing the three-stringed shamisen and the Hanawa-bayashi festival music of Akita Prefecture.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline Biz
programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Lunch On!
programme.desc: Tottori is famous for its sand dunes, but there's also a lot of deliciousness going on in this wonderful prefecture. So, we dedicate this entire episode to highlight the yummy lunches of Tottori.

programme.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
programme.desc: Learn about easy, delicious, and healthy cooking with Chef Rika in five minutes! Featured recipe: Soba with Spicy Meat.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Missing limbs, bruises, medical devices... The look-alike dolls for children with a unique appearance handcrafted by A Doll Like Me are helping to further an inclusive world.

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: Horsehair crab is favored in Japan for its sweet, delicate meat and the rich umami of its innards, or kani miso. Discover more about this treasure from the seabeds of Hokkaido.
